tool.name: Peak Filter
tool.description: This script filters the features and samples according to NAs present. Noise filling is available.

param.name: noiseBool
param.label: Noise Filling. If a class in a feature is entirely missing it gets replaced by noise

param.name: FeatFilt
param.label: Missing values threshold above which a feature is removed

param.name: SampFilt
param.label: Missing values threshold above which a feature is removed

tool.help: This is a basic Galaxy wrapper for Peak filtering which takes a .csv file (data matrix) and a .xml file (metadata) and returns a dataset filtered on features and samples (and noise filled) .csv file.
